title: Bilgewater Music Not Playing (Even when selected)
body:
When I select playing the Bilgewater event music instead of the Updated theme, there is no sound.
(Currently when the music option is changed from Updated to Bilgewater, there is no sound for the Bilgewater theme. )

This is probably cause I got a new Mac and redownloaded League after the event, but how do I fix it to get the sound file in the game?

replies.body:
Hey HolyDelRey,

With the end of the Burning Tides event comes the end of Bilgewater music. Unfortunately, the UI didn't change when the music was turned off D: The Bilgewater option will be removed next patch. 

Sorry about that! The good news is, it's not related to your Mac!

Have you guys considered keeping the song in as an option? I would love to be able to keep playing it on summoners rift. it seems a bit of a waste of your time to produce a good soundtrack then not keep it in.
It's something we could certainty have a discussion around.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=uf6IZv4d,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-16T00:39:31.274+0000)
>
> It's something we could certainty have a discussion around.

Is there any downside to keeping it as an option? Sure some people don't like it, but those people have the option to choose the original.

I cannot hope this happens harder the bilgewater music was so good for SR it is really a huge let-down to see that is gone. With the addition of DMP it would be nice to have different flavors of music since the standard has been played so much it doesn't really get heard that much anymore.

I really would like to see some of the resources used in it the Bilgewater event to stay.  The map and music could stick around as an alternate ARAM map (Swap between the two at random)?

It just seems so unfortunate to let all these really cool things just... go to waste.  They weren't even a game mode thing where interest would peter out and require heavy maintenance; just a visual/musical alternative thing that was supergreat to have.
I want Bilgewater music to stay. -_- Best OST ever. Classic LoL music much worse.
